categories: Category:Wizards of the Coast Expanded Universe articles

nodes.text: SPHA-T: An Expanded Universe Vehicle is a web enhancement written by Cory J. Herndon and released by Wizards of the Coast on December 4, 2003 as a companion to The New Essential Guide to Vehicles and Vessels. It provides a description and Star Wars Roleplaying Game stats for a Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery unit.
